experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Brand Decadenz (www.decadenz.co.in) is on its journey to disrupt the Indulgence market with its range of category creating products, Exciting packaging formats for consumption, and 24*7*365 availability at your fingertips.Our first flagship launch - the Signature spoonable Chocolate Fudge jar range- has been making Chocolate products exciting again, creating a fresh new category with an evolved dark chocolate product, burst of goodness elements, cool new consumption format and 360 degree use cases - Cravings, Unique Gifting, and Any time Celebrations. With brand availability in NCR across all major Food tech apps (Zomato, Swiggy et al) & E-Commerce operators (Amazon et al), and serviced via our network of owned and partner operated dark warehouses, Decadenz has taken a micromarket-led, digital aided approach to both distribution and brand building. Facebook:  decadenzindia

With brand availability in NCR across all major Food tech apps (Zomato, Swiggy et al) & E-Commerce operators (Amazon et al), and serviced via our network of owned and partner operated dark warehouses, Decadenz has taken a micromarket-led, digital aided approach to both distribution and brand building. experience.title: Management Consultant
experience.description: Consulting experience in the Consumer space across digital strategy, go-to-market execution, and omni-channel play.  Co-authored thought leadership on e-commerce (CII) and omni-channel retail (RAI)
